extendedInfo.description: Maybe it is the simplest and fastest notepad application in the world. No audio, no image, no location, but just text.  If you would like to have a extremely powerful notepad, please choose EverNote or other alternatives, however if all you need is just a piece of white paper and a pen, please choose MiniNote.   Simple and Efficient. suitable for recording urgent matters or fantastic idea anytime anywhere.

reviews.title: Tablet and phone ...
reviews.comment: I use it on both. Very sleek and simple but effective UI. I sync the backup file via wifi, back and forth. Easy way to keep my androids uptodate with info I need. THX! Update: have to remove 2 stars because the default sorting, which isn\'t changeable, makes it not worth having if you create a lot of notes. Quest continues, uninstalled... Change the Sort and I\'ll use it even pay for it. Ciao
reviews.author: Tony Gugliuzza

reviews.comment: Mini notepad is excellent.good working with my HTC incredible s.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: MiniNote
reviews.comment: Works very well, all sharing options work except with Google Docs unfortunately.
reviews.author: A Google User
